column2: June 19]], [[1983]]) is an Irish actor. He portrayed [[Kíli]] in [[The Hobbit (film series)

column1: When his participation was announced, some confusion arose whether the actor cast was Aidan Turner, star of ''[[wikipedia:Being Human (TV Series)
column3: Aiden Turner]], star of ''[[wikipedia:All My Children
column4: All My Children]]'', as an article on Deadline.com that was amongst the first to announce the cast used both spellings in its report.<ref>Deadline.com, ''[http://www.deadline.com/2010/10/peter-jackson-sets-first-names-for-the-hobbit/ Peter Jackson sets first names for ''The Hobbit'']'', accessed [[29 October
